1.title: Ake no Ba no Buin-tachi

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The students go to battle with foes from Tres Espana and learn the motivation behind the attack. But when they search for an ally, they discover it may do more harm than good.

2.title: Butai-jo no Senkoku-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: A Musashi ship crashes on English soil and a mysterious stranger offers aid. Meanwhile, the connection between Felipe and Juana becomes clear.

3.title: Do Jo no Kudari-mono

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Negotiations between the Musashi students and the English heat up as Shirojiro suggests an unusual solution. Meanwhile, Tenzo learns the identity of the cloaked stranger.

4.title: Gekijou no Shihaisha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: As the students prepare for a celebration, Tenzo and his new friend grow closer. Meanwhile, Horizon questions Tori's motives.

5.title: Ryouba no Jindoushugisha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: A series of duels pits Musashi students against their English counterparts, but there may be more to these exhibitions. Meanwhile, feelings strengthen between the two couples during the festival.

6.title: Hiroba no Danjou

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: The duels continue, a skeleton army emerges, and a doppelganger leads to surprise and suspicion.

7.title: Hiroma no Kataribe

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: The Musashi students play politics as they're caught between the demands of the English and the dangers of Tres Espana.

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Both Tres España and the Musashi formulate new strategies in their attempts to defeat one another. Meanwhile, two writers clash over Shakespeare.

11.title: Hanabatake no Goukakusha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Tenzo risks everything to rescue Mary, but she's not yet sure she should be saved. Meanwhile, the Musashi students face a new round of attacks in the naval battle with Tres Espana.

1.title: Kyokai-sen Mae no Seiretsu-sha-tachi

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The students at Ariadust Academy must use speed, skill, and teamwork to outsmart their teacher during a wild chase around the city. Later, Tori Aoi, the supposedly talentless head of the student council, announces his plan to ask out his friend, Horizon, who died 10 years ago.

2.title: Shokujiba no Seijun-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: The students receive a history lesson, a new classmate makes a mysterious entrance, and Tori continues his quest to confess his love to the long-dead Horizon.

3.title: Machinaka no Yugeki-shu

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The students prepare for an exorcism, Kimi worries about her brother, and the story of Horizon's death becomes clearer.

4.title: Yaten-ka no An'yaku-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: A fierce fighter may become a new student. Meanwhile, a surprise death sparks a global battle.

5.title: Gekka no Sotsugyo-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: The city faces a disaster of epic proportions and an android's true significance is revealed.

6.title: Kokuhaku-ba no Daiben-shu

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Horizon is blamed for the city's destruction and is set to be executed. When the students discover that the android is actually their former classmate, they must decide if and how to rescue her.

7.title: Musashi no Kishi

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: The students can't agree on whether to rescue Horizon. To settle the debate, the two factions agree to a series of battles. Will they risk starting a war to save their friend?

8.title: Zen'iki no Shiji-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: The argument over Horizon's fate takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Pope President Innocentius enters the fray.

9.title: Takane no Hana

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Kimi's special talents settle the debate over Horizon once and for all.

10.title: Sutaatorain no Rappafuki

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: The war has begun! Attacks rage on land and in the sky. Will the students' array of weapons be enough for the fight?

11.title: Musashi no Fukano Otoko

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: The Testament Union is gaining ground, but Tori has a plan. Meanwhile, Futayo faces off against an enemy in the forest.

12.title: Heikoksen-jo eno Aitai-sha

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Tori locates Horizon and confesses his love. The only way to save both of their lives is to convince Horizon she is human. Is their bond strong enough to survive?

13.title: Kyokaisen-jo no Seiretsu-sha-tachi

episode of.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Innocentius renews his attacks on the Ariadust students. Horizon reaches a critical turning point, and new dangers approach.

imdb.plot outline: The students of the Ariadust Academy must use their unique abilities to gain allies during a reenactment of the 1588 A.D. invasion of England by the Spanish Armada. Meanwhile the class must simultaneously defend the resurrected heir to the Mikawa throne against the various world superpowers that are now their enemies.
imdb.title: Horizon in the Middle of Nowhere
plot: The students of the Ariadust Academy must use their unique abilities to gain allies during a reenactment of the 1588 A.D. invasion of England by the Spanish Armada. Meanwhile the class must simultaneously defend the resurrected heir to the Mikawa throne against the various world superpowers that are now their enemies.
synopsis: In the far future, humans abandon a devastated Earth and traveled to outer space. However, due to unknown phenomenon that prevents them from traveling into space, humanity returns to Earth only to find it inhospitable except for Japan.To accomodate the entire human population, pocket dimensions are created around Japan to house in the populace. In order to find a way to return to outer space, the humans began reenacting human history according to the Holy book Testament. But in the year 1413 of the Testament Era, the nations of the pocket dimensions invade and conquer Japan, dividing the territory into feudal fiefdoms and forcing the original inhabitants of Japan to leave.It is now the year 1648 of the Testament Era, the refugees of Japan now live in the city ship Musashi, where it constantly travels around Japan while being watched by the Testament Union, the authority that runs the re-enactment of history. However, rumors of an apocalypse and war begins to spread when the Testament stops revealing what happens next after 1648.Taking advantage of this situation, Toori Aoi, head of Musashi Ariadust Academy's Supreme Federation and President of the student council, leads his fellow classmates to use this opportunity to regain their homeland.
